rules_text:
When The Apocalypse Sisters enters, it takes the stage. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
Whenever The Apocalypse Sisters attacks, up to one target creature takes the stage.
rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn and takes the stage if it's offstage. At the beginning of the next end step, that creature deals 5 damage to itself.
